mapper.select: SELECT uid AS uid , user_id AS userId , pwd AS pwd , nickname AS nickname , gender AS gender , birthday AS birthday , reg_dt AS regDt , access_tp AS accessTp , user_type AS userType FROM toy_cont.users WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT a.bid AS bid , a.pid AS pid , a.title AS title , a.views AS views , a.cmt_count AS cmtCount , a.is_use AS isUse , a.reg_dt AS regDt , b.board_link AS boardLink , b.board_name AS boardName , c.contents AS contents , d.likeCount AS likeCount FROM toy_cont.board a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT bid, b_type, board_name, board_link FROM toy_cont.board_group) b ON a.bid = b.bid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT bid, contents, pid FROM toy_cont.board_info) c ON a.pid = c.pid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT(pid), COUNT(*) AS likeCount FROM toy_cont.board_like GROUP BY pid) d ON a.pid = d.pid WHERE uid = #{uid} AND is_use = 1 ORDER BY a.reg_dt DESC
